clues.text: If you're looking for these incredible title creatures, a J.K. Rowling compendium will alert you "Where to Find Them"
Parents-to-be might want to take a look at Heidi Murkoff's "What to Expect When" this is happening

Dr. Cole Hendron races to save humanity as a rogue planet hurtles towards Earth in the sci-fi epic "When" this happens
"A Storm of Swords" is the third book in a series by him
In Sue Grafton's alphabet book series, "U Is for" this, something pulling us away from safety
2017's "The Midnight Line" is Lee Child's 22nd book about this former military policeman who drifts across the U.S. solving crimes
